creator: bbirtles@mozilla.com
summary: Split console close button should use fill: var(--theme-toolbar-photon-icon-color)

comments.text:
Created attachment 8980452
Screenshot

In the light theme, the color of the two close buttons are different and it looks odd.
comments.author: bbirtles@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Thanks! Brian.

I didn't apply the photon icon color fill. We need to apply the photon icon color fill the sidebar of webconsole as well.
comments.author: mantaroh@gmail.com

comments.text:
Created attachment 8980469
Bug 1464265 - Apply photon icon fill to close button of webconsole.

Webconsole has two close buttons. (split console and sidebar)
This patch will apply photon icon color fill to these buttons.

Review commit: https://reviewboard.mozilla.org/r/246634/diff/#index_header
See other reviews: https://reviewboard.mozilla.org/r/246634/
comments.author: mantaroh@gmail.com
